channel.title: Devolution v7
channel.description:
In devolution v7 it gives you a bronze longsword and a wooden shield everytime you log in. I tried searching through a few folders for 1291(Bronze longsword id) and didn't come up with anything. Does anyone know how to get rid of this?
Thanks

item.title: Devolution v7
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Its the item id + 1

Read full topic

@Deathly wrote:

Go into player java. Search unique then ul come up with starting shit -1 = 0 so just change the ids to the uitem ids
